data: Robert L. Merlino Robert L. Merlino robert-merlino@uiowa.edu Ph.D., University of Maryland, 1980 405 VAN (319) 335-1756 Lab: B01, B04 VAN Lab Phone: (319) 335-1834 https://merlino.lab.uiowa.edu/ Experimental plasma physics. Basic plasma physics problems, including laboratory simulations of space plasma phenomena, dusty plasmas Facilities include two lab rooms with three plasma chambers Major equipment includes two Q-machines with magnetic field up to 0.5 T; each machine is dedicated to a single graduate student Students develop skills including: vacuum, electronics, data acquisition, image analysis, instrument fabrication Employment opportunities include industry, government labs and universities
